comment.author: 35234565@N04
comment._content: Thanks Wystan for linking the two photographs. See an aerial view of Rosecliff, and more details about the house at digitalcollections.smu.edu/cdm/singleitem/collection/ryr/... We'll add some of this information to the record the next time we update.
